Title: The Grapes of Wrath
Writer: Nunnally Johnson (screen play), John Steinbeck (based on the novel by)
Actors: Henry Fonda, Jane Darwell, John Carradine, Charley Grapewin
Plot: Tom Joad returns to his home after a jail sentence to find his family kicked off their farm due to foreclosure. He catches up with them on his uncle's farm and joins them the next day as they head for California and a new life - Hopefully.
